full_summary:
### Fiberglass Reinforced Polymer Bridge Design and Supply, Jasper National Park

* ** Tender Reference:** cb-9351-24409071
* ** Amendment Number:** 4
* ** Solicitation Number:** 5P468-23-0174/A
* ** Publication Date:** September 21, 2023
* ** Tender Closing Date:** October 24, 2023, at 16:00:00 hours
* ** Amendment Date:** October 24, 2023

### Project Overview

Parks Canada Agency requires services of an experienced Fiberglass Reinforced Polymer (FRP) bridge supplier for the design and supply of three spans of an FRP bridge in Jasper National Park. The successful contractor must design and supply the bridge compliant with national and local regulations.

### Tender Specifications

* **UNSPSC Code:** 81101523 - Urban Design and Engineering Service
* **Procurement Category:** Service (SRV)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Important Notes

* Proposal submissions received by fax and email will be accepted as official.
* Parks Canada is not currently accepting bids via SAP Ariba; proposers must submit their bids via fax or email, as indicated in the solicitation document.
* The only acceptable email address for responses to proposal solicitations is `soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca`. Proposals submitted by email directly to the Contracting Authority or any other email address will not be accepted.

### Contract Requirements

* The contractor shall complete the work no later than March 1, 2024.
* All proposals must be submitted in either English or French, as per official languages.
* National Park Regulations require all work to be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.

### Enquiries

* All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature should be submitted to the Contracting Authority.
* Enquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted in writing and received no later than eight (8) business days prior to the tender closing date to allow sufficient time for a response.

### Attachments

* Solicitation Document [e---sow-23-0174a.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9351/e---sow-23-0174a.pdf)
* Request for Proposal Document [e---ae-rfp
